subject: Greetings to you and your fami
body:
Greetings to you and your family in the name of God. 
My name is Maureen A Greaves a widow from the United Kingdom Married to late Mr. Victor Greaves. I am in a hospital at the moment undergoing treatment for Esophagi Cancer in Switzerland, My late husband worked with the UK embassy in Qatar Doha Republic and we were married for many years without any child before his death. I found your profound contact email  from a computerized data, and i decided to contact you, based on this my present health condition I have decided to donate 2.5 Million Dollars for the Less Privileged orphanage/motherless babies before I die due to advise according to my late Husband in my last dream.
 
Beloved i wish to see this project completed and 40% will be set-aside for your humble Assistance and 60% will be for the project. I sincerely believe you are a GOD-fearing person who can help me out and maintain my last wishes without betrayal.
 
Please kindly reply to me  
so that i can give you the deposit certificate with the information to contact the bank  where the money is deposited. May the Lord bless you abundantly.
murges1178@gmail.com
 
My sincere regards,
Maureen A Greaves.

subject: Re: Greetings to you and your fami
body:
Dear Maureen Greaves,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition, and I hope you are receiving the best possible treatment.

I appreciate your intention to donate a significant amount of money to help the less privileged and orphaned children. It's a noble cause, and I would be interested in learning more about how I can assist you in fulfilling your last wishes.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know which bank the money is currently deposited in and what steps need to be taken to access it. Additionally, if there are any legal or administrative requirements that need to be fulfilled, please let me know so that we can proceed accordingly.

Thank you once again for considering me for this opportunity. May God bless you as well.

Best wishes,
Dianne
